data.title: Not All PC Makers Promise to Honour Intel's Extended CPU Warranty
data.meta_description: Intel recently announced it would offer an extra two-years warranty on its 13th and 14th gen Core CPUs, but it now seems like not all PC makers will follow suit. The Verge contacted 14 major PC makers and got a very mixed response when they asked if these companies would offer extended warranties on...
